info.name: FDX Developer Hub
info.description:
**Notes:**

- We need to update drJwtSecret in postman environment from Github’s project resource folders [src/main/resources/dr/drpk.txt](https://github.com/Mastercard/Fdx-Mock-Auth-Server/blob/main/src/main/resources/dr/drpk.txt)
    
- We need to add pmlib_code(A crypto utility library for Postman) to global variable, refer this [url](https://joolfe.github.io/postman-util-lib/#installation) to get variable value.

item.name: Server metadata
item.description: Provides metadata about the OAuth 2.0 authorization server, including endpoint locations and supported features.

item.name: Dynamic Client Registration

body.raw:
{
"client_name": "11TestName1221",
"redirect_uris": ["{{redirectUrl}}"],
"jwks_uri": "https://www.jsonkeeper.com/b/3FJT",
"scope": "client.create client.read fdx:transactions:read fdx:accountbasic:read openid fdx:customerpersonal:read fdx:accountdetailed:read fdx:investments:read fdx:paymentsupport:read fdx:accountpayments:read fdx:bills:read fdx:images:read fdx:rewards:read fdx:tax:read fdx:statements:read fdx:customercontact:read",
"token_endpoint_auth_method": "private_key_jwt",
"token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg": "PS256",
"grant_types": [
    "client_credentials",
    "authorization_code",
    "refresh_token"
],
"response_types": [
    "code"
],
"id_token_signed_response_alg": "PS256",
"id_token_encrypted_response_alg": "RSA-OAEP",
"id_token_encrypted_response_enc": "A256GCM",
"request_object_signing_alg": "PS256"
}

exec: 'exp': currentTimestamp + 3000, // expiry time is 30 seconds from time of creation

item.description: As per [RFC 7591 - OAuth 2.0 Dynamic Client Registration Protocol (ietf.org)](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7591)

item.name: PAR+RAR Authorize

exec: //'sub': "user1"  // PAR enforces ISS != SUB, plus we may not know the sub, so leave out.
'exp': currentTimestamp + dataholderAccessDuration, // expiry time is 300 (5 min) from time of creation

"scope": "fdx:transactions:read fdx:accountbasic:read openid fdx:customerpersonal:read fdx:accountdetailed:read fdx:investments:read fdx:paymentsupport:read fdx:accountpayments:read fdx:bills:read fdx:images:read fdx:rewards:read fdx:tax:read fdx:statements:read fdx:customercontact:read",
'exp': currentTimestamp + 3000, // expiry time is 30 seconds from time of creation
// Build the URL Request for Users Browser
<button id="copyButton" type="button" data-clipboard-action="copy" data-clipboard-target="#copyText" style="background:green;color:white;">Copy to Clipboard</button>

urlencoded.description: Spring Auth does not support Hybrid Flow so DO NOT send ID_TOKEN

item.name: PAR Authorize (Don't hit copy the url from curl)

query.description: For FinbankAuth removed: id_token, but still returns it

item.description: Please refer RFC - [RFC 9126 - OAuth 2.0 Pushed Authorization Requests (ietf.org)](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc9126) and [RFC 9396 - OAuth 2.0 Rich Authorization Requests (ietf.org)](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc9396) for implementation.

exec: //'sub': "user1"  // PAR enforces ISS != SUB, plus we may not know the sub, so leave out.
'exp': currentTimestamp + dataholderAccessDuration, // expiry time is 300 (5 min) from time of creation

"scope": "fdx:transactions:read fdx:accountbasic:read openid fdx:customerpersonal:read fdx:accountdetailed:read fdx:investments:read fdx:paymentsupport:read fdx:accountpayments:read fdx:bills:read fdx:images:read fdx:rewards:read fdx:tax:read fdx:statements:read fdx:customercontact:read",
